reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, with one noting how the long lantern sleeves add a touch of elegance, and many appreciating how it fits right above the waistline.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I ordered 2!
items.body: The ZESICA Women’s Fall Mock Neck Cropped Sweater is my new favorite fall staple! The ribbed knit is unbelievably soft and cozy, yet lightweight enough that I don’t overheat. The mock neck adds a touch of chic sophistication, and the cropped cut pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans, skirts, or leggings. I ordered the sand color in medium, and it’s gorgeous—neutral, versatile, and exactly as pictured. The fit is flattering without being too tight, and the sleeves have just the right amount of stretch for comfort. It’s held up beautifully in the wash with no pilling or shrinking. This sweater looks effortlessly stylish whether dressed up with jewelry and boots or kept casual for a cozy day in. I’ve already gotten so many compliments wearing it. Definitely a must-have for fall and winter! Read more
items.author: Ash

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect!
items.body: Classy, stylish, soft, well fitted, great value, stretchy, beautiful coverage, I can go on and on and on. This sweater is absolutely beautiful. Fits so well, it’s so cute and can be worn on any occasion Read more
items.author: Emberwick Ranch Texas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cozy and Stylish Addition to Family Photos
items.body: I recently purchased this sweater for our family picture, and it turned out to be the perfect choice. Not only did it enhance the overall aesthetic of our photo, but it also provided a level of comfort that exceeded my expectations. The fabric of the sweater is soft and cozy, making it ideal for a variety of occasions. In the context of our family picture, it not only kept me warm but also added a touch of style to the ensemble. The fit was just right, and I appreciated the attention to detail in the design. What sets this sweater apart is its versatility. Beyond the photoshoot, I've found myself reaching for it on multiple occasions. It's become a staple in my wardrobe due to its comfort and the way it effortlessly elevates any outfit. The quality is evident, and I'm confident that it will withstand the test of time. Whether you're looking for a reliable piece for special occasions or a go-to sweater for everyday wear, this option ticks all the boxes. Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. If you're in search of a comfortable and stylish sweater that can seamlessly transition from family photos to casual outings, this is undoubtedly a fantastic choice. Highly recommended! Read more
items.author: Air_McNair

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Crop Top
items.body: Soft, stretchy, cool feeling fabric. Thick enough to not be see through. Comfy. Puffed sleeves make it extra cute. Item is very much a crop top sweater. I returned it as it was quite short on me I'm 5'8", 125lbs and wearing a small. Read more
items.author: Nightjar09

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and fit!
items.body: Great fit, beautiful color, and material is nice! Loved it so much I bought it in another color. Read more
items.author: Renea Matter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, true to size
items.body: This sweater is very cute. I am 5’3”, 127lbs and the small fits great. I’m short waisted and it hits right at my higher-waist jean waistline. Very flattering fit. The material is not too thick at all and it is soft. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not quite right
items.body: The sweater itself feels nice and looks good, but it's only a crop if you have a long torso and the color is way more olive-y than the dark green in the picture. The sleeves don't have much of a bell and the neckline is pretty wide, definitely not a mock neck. Dunno if I got the wrong sweater or if the product pics are just bad, but there are no labels so it's impossible to tell. Nice sweater, but I guess don't get too attached to the color/fit in the product pics. Read more
items.author: Kelsey Griffiths

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Great color exactly as show. Love the warmth and quality. Size is right on and is a crop sweater Read more
items.author: ams

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hotpink, Nutmeg, Sand, Lightblue, Rose, Black, Camel, Darkgreen, Khaki, Ivory, Purple, Darkblue, Green, Lightgreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
